net.truelicense.ui.wizard

Interface WizardView<S>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of the wizard's states.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DisplayBean, InstallBean, LicenseBean, UninstallBean, WelcomeBean, WizardBean

    public interface WizardView<S>
    A view for a generic wizard user interface.
    • In a Swing app, this could be a JPanel.
    • In a JSF app, this could be the backing bean in a Facelet.
    Since:
    TrueLicense 2.3
    Author:
    Christian Schlichtherle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      S backState()
      Returns the state to switch to when the back-button gets pressed, or the current state if switching is not possible.
      S nextState()
      Returns the state to switch to when the next-button gets pressed, or the current state if switching is not possible.
      void onAfterStateSwitch()
      This hook gets called by the controller after the state of the model has changed.
      void onBeforeStateSwitch()
      This hook gets called by the controller before the state of the model changes.

    • Method Detail

      • backState

        S backState()
        Returns the state to switch to when the back-button gets pressed, or the current state if switching is not possible.

      • nextState

        S nextState()
        Returns the state to switch to when the next-button gets pressed, or the current state if switching is not possible.

      • onAfterStateSwitch

        void onAfterStateSwitch()
        This hook gets called by the controller after the state of the model has changed. A typical implementation may want to show this view.

      • onBeforeStateSwitch

        void onBeforeStateSwitch()
        This hook gets called by the controller before the state of the model changes. A typical implementation may want to hide this view.
